KA.AQWE.content: men raise (arbeiten) themselves out of backwardness (Rohigkeit) [progression] > enlightenment: man’s release from self-incurred minority, primarily in matters of religion > a ruler knows there is no public danger to permit public use of reason to critique legislation > he who has a well-disciplined army, should not fear these specters (Schatten) of reason: argue as much as you want and about whatever you want but obey! [freedom of spirit of people w/ impassable limits] > NATURE has cherished the germ (Keim) of the inclination and need for free thought: man has dignity (Würde) more than a machine
